price: 107. Wana ezalaki mpo bazalaki kolinga bomoyi bwa nsé koleka oyo ya likolo, mpe ya sólo, Allah akambaka bapengwi te.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمُ ٱسۡتَحَبُّواْ ٱلۡحَيَوٰةَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا عَلَى ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bi-annahumu is'taḥabbū al-ḥayata al-dun'yā ʿalā al-ākhirati wa-anna al-laha lā yahdī al-qawma al-kāfirīna
